short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick search selected text on YouTube™

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension for searching selected text on YouTube™ from the context menu.

Instructions:
• Highlight specific text you want to search for on YouTube™.
• Right-click on highlighted text.
• Select [Search YouTube for "..."] option.

A new tab will open and search YouTube™ with your selected phrase.

Enjoy!
